title: New AP items Riot

replies.body: Well it might be because high AP items aren't what mages really need.

I think they are trying to move away from the traditional mage who just has burst + some utility. That's why all these items have insane utility and are super unique, but at the expense of AP to keep them balanced.

**Riot** stated in patch [5.13](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-513-notes#patch-Rabadons-Deathcap) that they wanted to keep {{item:3089}} **Rabadon's Deathcap** as the _"I want lots of AP"_ item. If there is a problem with burst in 6.9, I'd imagine they'd buff that.
